subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
Drug Abuse and Traffic
lead_paragraph: Sweeney, a star with the San Diego Chargers in the 1960s and ’70s, accused the team of handing out drugs to players and fostering his own addiction.
snippet: Sweeney, a star with the San Diego Chargers in the 1960s and ’70s, accused the team of handing out drugs to players and fostering his own addiction.
